name: chat-app
description: A modern, full-stack realtime chat application built with **React + Vite**, **MongoDB**, **Express**, **TailwindCSS + DaisyUI + PostCSS**, and **Socket.io** for realtime communication. This project is designed to be scalable, responsive, and user-friendly, offering a clean UI and smooth chatting experience similar to WhatsApp/Telegram.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
